title: [Game Mode] "Friendly-fire?!?"
body:
I have always imagined this game mode although there could be serious issues with trolling your own team, so this probably won't get too much up voting. However, hasn't anyone ever thought how crazy it would be if Rumbles Equalizer or Lux Laser(just to name 2 off the top of my head), could actually do damage to every champion/minion hit?  That's right including your own teammates!!! I am sure tons of people will rip on this but if you have anything to add or if this gives anyone more ideas, that's great too! Just a thought of course because I know it would be entertaining. 

Lets shoot for that NONAKILL!!!! (nonakill??? maybe?? idk just tried it out :P) 

Love the community and love league hope you all have some interesting ideas even if it is rippin my idea!

replies.body: Yes, people could troll their own team; however, it goes both ways.  It would give players a lot more to think about before using a skill or ult.  Like every game mode, there would be those that like it and dislike it.  Perhaps it would be better if it did 50% less dmg to your team and full dmg to enemy team.
There ya go!! Cannot believe I did not think of that!! I mean honestly though once you have a bit of experience shouldn't most people be able to dodge skills anyways LOL but lets not get into that
Hmmm... this makes me wonder... would Soraka (and other champ) heals/boosts/etc. also be provided to enemy champs (at reduced effectiveness)?  That would be interesting.

LOL. But thanks for the link, I just put up this thread to see if others had ideas to enhance this game mode,  never claimed this idea to be completely mine!
